G

generateCycle() - Method in class aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures.Graph
Method that sets off the word ladder generation cycle, first by calling a method that gets the word to ladder from the user, then calls a method that creates a new graph, then calls the search algorithm, evaluates its result and acts accordingly
getDistanceFromStartVertex() - Method in class aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures.Vertex
Method to return the distance that this vertex is from the start vertex
getHashIterator() - Method in class aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures.Graph
Method that returns the iterator for the hash table
getNeighbours() - Method in class aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures.Vertex
Method to return the LinkedList of neighbours
getPredecessor() - Method in class aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures.Vertex
Method to return the predecessor of the vertex
getWord() - Method in class aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures.Vertex
Method to return the word assigned to the vertex
Graph - Class in aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures
CS21120 WordLadder class that contains methods to create a graph and traverse the graph to find word ladders
Graph() - Constructor for class aber.dcs.cs21120.chs17.WordLadder.dataStructures.Graph
Default constructor that just initialises the hash table
